short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share, Save and Schedule interviews directly from Naukri.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hiring Bull extension allows you to extract a candidate information from Naukri and other portals and then save it to your Hiring Bull account.
